author: mrglavas
msg: Final field "DEFAULT_SIZE" is initialized with a constant expression.
Making this static to save some memory per instance of this class.

author: mrglavas
msg: Cleaning up SecuritySupport. We no longer need both SecuritySupport and SecuritySupport12
because Xerces now only compiles and runs on J2SE 1.2 or higher. This allows us to tighten up

author: mrglavas
msg: Removing SecuritySupport12. Since Xerces only supports J2SE 1.2 or higher this class is no longer needed.
